That being said, there is no need to compound the sin of employing a pod or K-cup while using that stuff that sits on the grocer's shelf for months. Use good coffee. Marley's is packed in foil and tasted fairly fresh.
Will buy again.  This Tellicherry peppercorn seems to be stronger then non-Tellicherry.  One pound is a lot, but it will stay fresh in the refrigerator for over a year.

love the wolfgang puck restaurants,cookware,brand endorsed products, all his brand products / cuisine are amazing, i am a loyal fan, yet this creme caramel coffee is tasteless, no real coffee flavor, no hint of caramel or creme, it brews like a bit of steamed milk, that somewhat pasty tasteless feel on your palate. soooo dissapointed as i am such a loyal fan of all his brand, products. sadly,a waste of funds, did not return because i think food items are none refundable.

As someone who recently gave up soda, I very quickly learned that your alternatives are slim if you aren't drinking caffeine and/or carbonated beverages. These mixes have been wonderful. I like water enough, but sometimes I just need some flavor! I even take these to restaurants and mix one into a glass of water. It has really made giving up sodas much easier.

Summary: Fog Chaser Coffee + Morning = Great Start to the Day!
Text: This coffee has wonderful flavor and brews very well.  Works perfectly in our Keurig coffee maker.  Really like the pod style, actually easier to use than the cups.  Great product!

I'm not a huge fan of this type of dressing for salad..am more the creamy type.  However, I buy this stuff by the case for marinading.  I grill a lot and everything I grill....this is the marinade of choice.  It's easy and so good - just pop it into a dish with whatever I'm cooking and it always tastes amazing.  It can be a little thick, so sometimes I'll thin it just a touch but the flavor is spot on for any meat.
It is nice to find unsweetened bottled tea.  Can be a little strong, but over ice it is great.  Need to drink cold.

Four and One-Half Stars

This coffee's packaging is a send-up of Jamaican style down to its name: Marley Coffee. (By the way, I actually saw Bob Marley walking by himself on West 57th Street in the late seventies). Anyway, this coffee is meant for Pod coffee makers - did not realize this when I requested the coffee. I do not own a pod coffeemaker. You get 15 individual pod packets. Each pod holds a single serving/cup of coffee. To enable brewing in my coffee maker, I just cut the pods open and dumped into a coffee filter, and voila! Coffee has nice rich aroma, and it has a full flavor. It's definitely a better coffee than I had been drinking, which was your basic old school supermarket stuff. For reference, I am not someone who tolerates strong coffee well. Starbucks can give me a panic attack! So, I thought the kick and richness was very nice and just right for me.

As others have commented, if you're into that deep & dark, caffeine laden French roast, this may not be the coffee for you.

I decided to try this dry food on my two dogs, because of all the great reviews.

However....Neither dog will eat it. One dog took a couple bites, and refuses to eat it..The other dog wont even take a bite.
I tried mixing it with their favorite can food, but this only made matters worse. They would not even touch it.

I was confused about this, since one of my dogs will eat just about anything, while the other will eat dry food mixed with cannned.
The reviews were all good, so...

I checked the package...And, I think I may have found the answer...There is a last sale date of April 11, 2012....That's only about 6 weeks away.
I would never purchase a food that was going to expire so soon, even on sale in a store.

I now have a huge bag of dog food in the kitchen..I have tried daily to give each dog a little, but no go. They will not eat eat it!
The pieces are all the same size and color...Not appealing, and there is not even a smell that says "eat me, I am food". Could be cardboard, judging by
the dog's reaction.

Kind of hard to return, since it is opened and is 18 pounds of dog food.
I have a feeling it is either because the food is so old, or it is tainted. Dogs can sense when there is a problem with food!

Sorry about the bad review...But, This was money that will just end up getting poured into the rubbish.
Maybe I was only the unlucky one...Check the last sale dates on your package if any of your dogs wont eat it!

I will stick to Pedigree and Mighty Dog..less expensive, not as healthy, but both my dogs love it.
I cannot recommend this brand..I have two large dogs, mixed breed and are not usually choosy about what they eat.
Except for the Premium Edge, which they give a paws down to!
Pill Pockets have been a great way for me to give my Daschaund his meds! He takes 3 pills a day and this provides a way to protect my fingers and get his meds down with no fuss. Great product!

First of all, I'd say that this product tastes more like sweet potato than chicken. The white lumpy stuff in the package tastes like brown rice pasta than chicken. So I am not where the chicken is cuz you can't taste it. But my daughter absolutely loves it. She gobbles down the whole thing in minutes (except her teething time).

Although I am skeptical about the chicken part, I have to trust the labeling that says heavy amount of protein is in there.

I also tried the turkey and chicken training meal from Plum brand. It has way too much spice in there. Not for my baby who is just starting out on protein. I will try the Plum brand a bit later. But you can definitely taste the meat in their products.
Love the taste.  They are low in calories and better than other chips.  Satisfies my sweet cravings.  Give them a try
These skallops are so versatile.  I do a three dip batter and deep fry them, the family loves them.  You also can't beat the wonderful price.  I have a subscription so I never run out.

My dog is a 15 pound Maltese. He is really picky about what he will chew, so I did not think he would like these, but I figured  it was worth a try to see if he would like them. I put it on the floor and he ignored it, just as I had expected. He  only likes a couple of types of chews. The next evening, I was happy to see he was chewing away at it with glee. He was really liking it, I was glad I found something he actually likes. But the next morning, he was throwing up, and had really bad diarrhea all day. Poor doggy! The ironic thing is that these chew bones call themselves "digestive support"  "Health and Fun" NOT!!!! I threw them away and will never give them to my dog again. I would not recommend these dog chews.

Summary: great to have coconut oil as a spray
Text:
I love this product and it's wonderful to have coconut oil in a spray can. I use it for everything that I want a spray oil for. I'm a huge coconut oil fan so this product was just made for me!

The only reason I give it four stars is because the very first can stopped working after a few days. The spray push button seemed to "tip over" and would not dispense any oil, even though you could tell the cannister was clearly still about 95% full. That was a bummer since it's not cheap. I tried all sorts of things to get it spraying again without any success.

Finally I broke down and began using the second can, and so far no issues with that. But I do subtract one star because of the defective mechanism which implies poorly made. If it happened to me perhaps it's happened to others as well.

I originally saw truffle salt on a menu in a restaurant. I wanted to try it for myself and - WOW!

This product is a wonderful "finishing salt" for eggs, salads even french fried potatoes.

It gives a wonderful dimension to a dish and provides that "What did you add that made it so good" aura. Try this truffle salt and you will be delighted, too!

Summary: best dog food we have found!
Text: Our almost 6 year old golden retriever has been plagued with itchy dry skin and loose stools all his life and we have tried many high quality dog foods to no avail. Finally we found Orijen fish formula and he is doing great!!!! Looks beautiful, not licking and biting his paws and skin any more and his stools are perfect. And he loves the food!!! Just wish it were easier to find in the larger size bags.

Summary: Yum!  Tastes like fresh-brewed Starbucks... hot or iced... so convenient
Text: PIcked it up after tasting it in the store, and have been enjoying it all week.  Cannot be any easier -- no cleaning the coffee machine anymore, yeaaaah!  Hot water, dump it in, and mmmm.... and I normally HATE any instant coffee.  This is unlike any instant I've tried, and really does taste as good as Starbucks in the store.  The best part is that you don't need hot water... you can add cold water and ice for an awesome iced coffee.  Am going to try the decaf bc I'm obviously drinking a lot more coffee now that I've discovered this.

Summary: Just read review, then buy your own
Text: This is about the 4th re-order of Breakfast blend K-cups from Amazon.  I think that itself is the best review I can think of.  See me at the 10th reorder.

I saw this product on Shark Tank, and all the "Sharks" seemed to love it. I tried to order directly from the girls website, but shipping was just outrageous to New Jersey. Fortunately as an Amazon Prime member - I took advantage of the free shipping and ordered through Amazon. As usual, the package arrived quickly and all FIVE of us, went crazy to try the PB's! It was very runny, but we tried all of the flavors on a ritz cracker. The Kids and my wife all liked the Honey Pretzel best. I liked the cinnamon raisin, but it was a lukewarm "like" at best. None of the PB's had much flavor, kinda bland. I noticed it was very runny - so we stirred em up a bit and put them in the fridge to stiffen up. A day or so later, we tried them again - even more bland from the fridge. Maybe I didn't stir em up enough? I don't know - but now they're too hard to stir at all, so we'll see if we have the will to finish a jar or two if they get any more flavorful? Overall, we think it's way overpriced for the taste. We won't be buying any more jars, which is a shame cause I did want to support the fledgling company. I do wish them the best of luck though. To be fair we ONLY tried the 3 PB flavors. Nothing else.. So the othr flavors/products may be fantastic. Do try them, but a caution on the 3 flavors above, simply "ok".

Summary: great popcorn/fun and easy to use
Text: We have really enjoyed using this product. It is so simple to use-pre measured with oil, salt, and popcorn. It really makes "movie night" more fun with this popcorn. I give it and the seller my highest rating.

In the past I have bought my syrup from World Market when on sale and when I lived in Seattle. Although  our local  Fred Meyer store stocks Torani the flavors are limited. So I  subscribed the the sugar free variety pack thinking I could tolerate the two flavors I don't much care for. Wrong. the Raspberry and Irish Creme keep piling up because I don't like them. But some reviewers have given me a few ideas. I merely tolerate the hazelnut and vanilla. Love the caramel and chocolate. What I would really like is to be able to select my own sugar free variety pack and or be able to purchase one that has coconut (my absolute fav), white chocolate, almond, caramel, peppermint, and gingerbread syrup (I am addicted to this flavor). I would even settle for sugar free coconut in the three pack. PLEASE add more flavors.

Summary: Excellent if you're looking for a robust chai
Text: The normal Oregon Chai is good, but if you're more fond of the chai that you get at a certain chain of coffee shops that originate in Seattle, you want this chai.  It has the same tingling, almost burning, sensation that theirs does, and it's much cheaper and more convenient.  Just make sure you pick up a pump as well.
This spice is healthy and its great on everything...Sprinkle it on any vegetable to make it taste super, no need to use salt.

We just started ordering your coffee about Chrismas time ,,my husband is very fussy..We have to have decaf because of health reasons ,,I would recommend this kind of coffee to anyone ,it is safe for us and it tastes delicious,we look forward to getting up in the morning to get that first cup..Fran

I also had heard from my lamaze class that red rasberry tea was suppose to ease and assist in the birthing process(It is a uterine toner). Well, in my case it couldn't have been more true. I literally pushed 3 times and the baby was out, and that was my first baby. I drank the tea every day for the last two months of pregnancy, up to delivery day. I must say...this time in my 2nd pregnancy i'm going to do it the exact same way. I recommend this product to any woman who wants to have an easier, shorter delivery.

These chips are the best I ever had.
Very low in fat and taste great, I just wish they had less salt like amazon says they are.

I just got my order - their shipping is pretty fast!  And the smell of this matcha is just unbelievable.  This is so rich and sweet smelling, you would think it had a million and two calories, but it doesn't!  The flavor lives up to what the aroma promised.  I made this into lattes for an afternoon snack for myself and one of my kids and we loved it!  Plus we are getting a nice antioxidant boost at the same time.  Thank you, Red Leaf!  How will I ever get around to all the flavors I want to try?

Many drinks claim to give energy but are really just caffeine and sugar loaded. This drink is not only delicious and energizing but is also a healthy alternative. I just love the texture of the chia seeds too. I've found my new afternoon 'pick-me-up' in Drink Chia!
What can I say?? I am a big fan..The bag went quickly. As soon as anyone knows you have some o them you get a new best friend

WE FOUND THIS DOG FOOD ONLINE AND COULDN'T BELIEVE THAT IT WAS 95% BEEF WITH NO FILLERS! THIS IS HARD TO BEAT FOR PET FOOD. OUR GUYS LOVE THIS FOOD AND IT IS NICE TO KNOW IT ISN'T FILLED WITH JUNK. HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS FOOD.

This was a fine food until some time in early August, 2008. I bought two bags, this formula for my old, 140 lb dog, and lamb meal and rice for my 1 year old. They had loose stools the entire time. My older dog finished his bag, and I switched him to Innova, the diarrhea cleared up immediately, so the argument that Canidae makes on the web site about needing to make a slow transition is at best specious. I will have to throw out the remaining food for my young dog, to get him back to normal. Investigate the very large number of complaints on the web about the new formula before exposing your pet to it.
kept me awake during my 7am college classes.  Now I drink it at work.  Better than coffee, and much less intense.  Be careful you don't drink it too late in the day, or you won't be able to sleep...

Summary: Chantea Aloe Vera Green Tea, Passion Fruit
Text: When I open the bottle and took a sip, like others, I was startled by the little chicks of aloe vera in the drink. The green tea definitely had the fruity taste of the passion fruit and to me was a little sweet. Then I checked the label and saw that cane sugar was the second ingredient after water. To me, the passion fruit taste and the aloe vera pulp were the positives to this drink. The cane sugar amount was the negative.

My wife and I have decided hands down, this is our favorite K-cup. We've tried a lot of others, and Donut Shop and Caribu Daybreak are certainly still up there. However, this has a very solid body flavor with a medium roast. Almost a bold flavor with a smooth finish. Excellent flavor versus strength. Really nice to get up on a lazy Sunday morning and have a nice cup of Breakfast in Bed!

Also, I see another reviewer had problems with messy K-cups. I can say after about 6 boxes of theses, I haven't had any issues. Very unfortunate for the other reviewer, but looks like it was rather isolated.

Give it a try, you'll certainly enjoy it, the wife and I sure do!

I am a new tea drinker and I am certainly new to the world of Matcha tea. But oh, what a wonderful world it is! After reading all the rave reviews for Red Leaf Tea's amazing flavor assortment of Matcha teas on Steepster, I took the plunge and ordered their "2 in 1" Custom Matcha Tea. I chose Caramel and Madagascar Vanilla for my flavors and I am so glad I did! I am not sure I can adequately describe how much I love this tea and these flavors.
I had been a little apprehensive prior to ordering mainly because I had never heard of it before and it was so green. Even after it arrived, I didn't dive right into it. After a couple days I decided to make some and see what all the hype was about. One taste and I am hooked. The flavor is amazing! I had it hot and then I made some cold. They were both awesome! I mixed up a tumbler full for my daughter for her morning tea at work and she absolutely loved it. She said she thought it would also taste great in cupcakes and I agree! Now my wheels are turning about all the awesome ways I can incorporate this flavorful Matcha into recipes. On Red Leaf Tea's website they have some delicious recipes for smoothies, frappes etc that I can not wait to try. I love that there are so many possibilities of ways to use this tea besides drinking it (which is awesome in itself!).
I have been trying to diet but have a bit of a sweet tooth. Drinking this Caramel & Madagascar Vanilla was like having a dessert. I was totally satisfied. With a bit of sweetener added to these already uniquely superb flavors, this was like drinking a high calorie fattening dessert but was actually guilt free and healthy.
Finally, I definitely need to comment on the amount of energy I feel after drinking this tea. It is a really good energy not like a coffee or sugar rush. My whole transition from coffee and soft drinks to tea was to reap the vast health benefits associated with tea. I was pleasantly surprised when I read the various and significant health benefits of Matcha tea. Besides the antioxidants & cancer fighting properties, it also aids in weight loss and mood enhancement!
Great taste, health benefits and lots of ways to use it. It doesn't get better than that!
I highly recommend this brand of Matcha tea.

Summary: Tastiest of the kashi bar line in my opinion!
Text: Okay, so most of the kashi items are, in my opinion, hard to compare to other mainstream less healthy options, these however, have almost the exact same texture as the nature valley granola bars. They are definitely crunchy and a bit messy. I actually, for ease of eating purposes, whack my still wrapped/sealed bars against the counter so that the individual pack breaks into smaller/bite size pieces. This makes it easier to eat these, because biting into the bars is a little challenging (yes, they are THAT crunchy!) That being said, the flavor of these bars and the nice contrasting textures of seeds and grains is quite satisfying and delicious. If you like hearty, pumpkin, fall spice type of foods this is definitely for you. I would note however, the extreme crunchiness of these bars may not be conducive to someone who has a hard time chewing, and/or beware, as the grains/seeds have a tendency (not unlike popcorn hulls) to stick in teeth, maybe not great for anyone with dentures/braces. All in all though, these are definitely my favorite of the kashi bars in terms of flavor!

Summary: About as good as a potato chip can be
Text:
My wife's father, who retired a few years ago, was a potato farmer. He knows a thing or two about potatoes. When he was operating the farm, he sold most of his potatoes to Frito-Lay where they ended up as Lay's Potato Chips. He would always "test" the new crop of potatoes by making his own potato chips. He'd use a mandoline slicer to create nice thick slices of potato and then would deep fry them. A couple minutes later there would be these awesome, thick sliced, perfectly cooked chips which then got a sprinkling of salt. Best chips I've ever had.

Sorry for that long story, but these Gradma Utz Handcooked Potato Chips taste just like the chips my Father in law makes. They are awesome. They hold up to thick dips without cracking and breaking like some other well known "thin" chips do. I don't think chips could be much better than these.
The Cameron amaretto coffee had a strange taste to it.  We didn't like it at all, and we will not buy more Cameron coffee.

I have always been a fan of Lawry's seasonings, but when I couldn't find the enchilada sauce or taco seasonings in our grocery store I went online and found both on Amazaon.com.  I was thrilled!  I won't make enchildas or tacos without Lawry's!

Summary: Cats love it -- but I am concerned
Text:
This variety pack came to us as an Amazon Vine program sample. Our two cats have been living on various "high end" dry cat foods for some time now (e.g., the "Before Grain" foods in chicken, tuna and salmon versions, and some fancy pantsy "Duck a l'orange" stuff from our local pet shop). They have not been partial to canned foods, nor have I often gone the canned food route because it is less than convenient and didn't seem worth the candle since they seem to favor dry food (and mice and birds and whatever else they can glean from our little acre in the woods). They typically start out loving canned food, but after a few bites, the rest sits in the bowl and dries out before we toss it and go back to the dry food they've grown to love.

However, both of our cats are smitten by this stuff. It looks like real food out of the can, with large chunks of fish and seafood in a thickened broth. It doesn't have the strong fishy smell of most canned foods and looks like something I could almost be tempted to eat my self in a pinch. The 3 ounce size makes it perfect for a "treat" for the cats between feedings of dry food and they leave nothing behind when we dump a can in their dish (with some added hot water as they really love the broth).

But I'm not sure I want my cats eating this stuff for the same reason I don't want my eight year old eating at fast food franchises, much as she might love the food and snarf it up in a flash -- I'm concerned this food may not be a healthy thing for the animal eating it or for the planet. Seeing "Made in Thailand" emblazoned on the box made me immediately wonder whether this stuff might include ingredients banned in the US or could otherwise be manufactured without adequate regulation of methods and materials. The Chinese pet food fiasco certainly came to mind.

The discussions of other reviewers about the menadione used in this product confirms my concern. I'm also left to wonder about the source of the fish and seafood in these cans -- is it farm raised in Thailand and if so under what conditions; is it wild fish that may be subject to overfishing and at the very least ought to be feeding hungry humanity rather than going down my cats' gullets; what about mercury and other contaminants in the food?

Bottom line: my cats seem to love the stuff, but I'm not sure that will be sufficient to convince me to buy it again.
Very delicious bars.  The only problem I have with it is that the texture's a little bit off.  Besides that it's great.

Summary: Tasty, portable snack - a little tart
Text: I think I like these more than my son, who I purchsed them for as an easy and healthy snack.  I don't think there's much difference between the flavors, and the sour apple is fairly tart.  But overall, I think they're good, and they're really a great way to bring a serving of fruit with you anywhere.

Summary: was sent incorrect item-in correct box
Text: I was sent English Breakfast tea in a Decaf Earl Grey Box.  The incorrect k-cups were in the wrong box and strewn haphazardly in the box.  It seemed rather unprofessional, like someone had just thrown what they had in their kitchen in a box and sent to me.  I am not happy to say the least.  Amazon customer service was wonderful and refunded me.
Excellent product, i like this beer, for many year ago. I hoping that many people buy for a not time.
thanks for carrying this product .. you are the only place I can find it.. great service fast shipping..I'll be back
Unlike other K-Cups I was pleasantly surprised by the strong and good taste of this K-Cup. Definitely recommended for those looking for a stronger brew.

Summary: Taste Nirvana Coconut Water is the BEST!
Text: I have tried every different kind of coconut water and the Taste Nirvana real Coconut water with Pulp is the BEST!  Not only that, but the customer service at Taste Nirvana is excellent.
I BUY BARE ROOT BERRY PLANT THAT I PUT IN THESE BURLAP BAGS WITH POOTING SOIL TO TRANPLANT LATER INTO THE GROUND WHEN THE WEATHER GETS WARMER. THE BURLAP BAG ARE BIOGRADEABLE.

Summary: Bloodroot Powder That I purchased from Amazon
Text: I ordered bloodroot to use for prevention and therapeutic purposes. I have tried drinking it in tea, and also I tried to make some indian black salve in order to get rid of a really stubborn wort that I have had on my thumb for a very long time. I have used my own home-made black salve which was created from the bloodroot in several trial variations for a lot of times on the wort, but to no avail. The wort is still there. Nevertheless, I figured since I paid $40 for the lb, there must be something that I can use this herb for, so I did some google searches and found that it is simply a red version of tumeric, which is good for cooking, among other uses. The bloodroot is much more potent than its relative, yellow tumeric, so it takes much less of the red one for seasoning soups. I am still glad to have the powder, because of its reputation of curing and/or preventing tumerous cancers, among other things. I think that I will have it for a long time though.I might try using it for dye, like the American Native (Indians) used to do.

My dog is a very picky eater, but I thought I would give these treats a try and he loves them. He's a tiny five pound Chorkie so they are a perfect size for him and even if you had a bigger dog they'd be great for training.

This is the one flavor I order the most. I've had several attempts at Cappuccino from single server machine and was never impressed... until this one. The product is perfect for my tastes, I never need to add any milk or sugar, it's great as it is.

I ordered 2 packs of this product as it's my new favorite weekend morning drink. Again as with all of the products I find the price of the capsules to be too high but so far it hasn't stopped me from ordering more :)
Great sauce - definitely a good find.  Used it with chicken and rice tonight, adds a great flavor with a kick.

I thought it was great that there was hot cocoa for the keurig machine.  this is so watery when you make it.  green mountain needs to improve it.  it tastes like chocolate flavored water.  if you make a product that is intended for the machine it should work well in the machine.  i love all of the k-cup coffees but this cocoa sucks.
These have a stronger caramel flavor although still a medium strength coffee.  The best caramel flavored K-cup I've tried!  I will reorder them.

We like Plockys
They like us.
Plockys Plockys.
Mean no fuss.
Taste so good.
And healthy too.
Plockys Plockys.
Grab a bag or two.
Thank you Plockys!!
The company was on time and as advertised. We have used the product for some time and it works without giving you the jitters or the sudden collapse you get with caffiene products.

These bleached knuckle bones are great for the dogs teeth. Mine love them. Always supervise them when they have the bones and throw them away when they're gnawed down to sharp edges. They really get the plaque and tartar off.

This shipment was not as expected.  Yes, there were 24 k-cups. However, only 3 were flavored!  This was advertised as "24 ct flavored coffee sampler".  Additionally, 5 of the k-cups were decaf although a 24 count decaf sampler was a different item order choice.  Very disappointed.  Will not order this again.  Certainly not up to Amazon standards.

Summary: good product for joint pain for dogs
Text: My dogs enjoy one of these with their breakfast each morning. they seem to help with their joint pain even in cold climates. Also like the taste!!
Strong lemon flavor very sweet. Good in a pinch but would make lemon frosting for a not so sweet taste.

Summary: I buy this by the case!
Text:
This wine is so delicious! I tried it at a restaurant back in NYC and truly fell in love with it. It has such a nice round structure with a nice balance of tannins, fruit and acid. I have had this wine with Pizza, Beef Stew, and believe it or not some nice herb roasted chicken and it goes so great.

They also have a cool facebook page. I googled the wine as I wanted to buy a case and stumbled upon their facebook page.

I've made several batches of this Paragon popcorn and it has turned out great every time. Only once were there any unpopped kernels (and that was only 5 kernels). Last night alone, I made 3 batches of popcorn (each batch fills up 2 large bowls) and there were no unpopped kernels and it tasted great (obviously or I wouldn't have had to make 3 batches for movie night).

The popcorn comes well packed; when the UPS driver rang my doorbell he told me the package was very heavy and to be careful ....... I told him it was my popcorn. His eyes got large and said you really must love popcorn and I told him it was Paragon brand popcorn and you can't beat the taste or price.

I don't understand why people would buy Orville's popcorn at a ridiculous price when you can buy this great popcorn.

If you love popcorn and eat a lot of it, I highly recommend this Paragon bulk bag of popcorn.

This item arrived fairly quickly but was unedible. I can't help but wonder if it spoiled in transit or was it spoiled at the warehouse. For starters, the color wasn't anything like the picture. It wasn't bright orange. It was more brown in color. It was only half full and it definitely wasn't "fluffy" looking. Against my better judgement, I spooned more than a few into my mouth only to discover that it had a horrible bitter taste to it. Because it is a grocery item, Amazon's policies prohibit its return (for safety reasons). However, Amazon did continue to earn my business by quickly refunding the $20 I paid for it. The refund processed within a day. I won't ever buy this product again.
When i took this out my puppy couldn't wait to get into it.  I put the treats in and he went to town.  One of the best toys i've gotten him ever.
So far, at least one of the packages is filled with defective K-Cups. When brewing, the top of the K-Cup separates, and coffee spills all over the place. Not happy about this.
This is the best sugar free gum around -- no nutrasweet/aspartame in it & no bad "fake sweetener after taste"

I have only used liquid stevia for my tea and coffee for the past 2 years - NOW's is a fantastic price - I won't change!

If you want fast delivery, though, don't order through Nutricity. I ordered it (as a prime member) and didn't receive it for 9 days - meaning I couldn't take it with me on the trip - which is why I ordered the 2 oz bottle....

Summary: Great brew -- rich, full bodied and smooth
Text:
I make mine in a french press, course grind w/ a burr grinder, 3.5 to 4 minutes brew time.

I've found this blend to be very rich, full bodied and smooth. I have tried one other blend from Raven's Brew and was similarly impressed. I plan on trying many more from this company and highly recommend giving this one a shot (or two or three). This is definitely one I will order more of in the future.

Summary: I said 2, he said 4 - average of 3
Text:
I'm not a fan of energy drinks but I thought I would give this a try. We only received one can to sample and review so I took the first sip and passed it on to my man who promptly drained the rest of it. I didn't care for the taste, but that is what has always been an energy drink turnoff to me - I can't even choke down a red bull. My man, however, thought it was quite good. The unfortunate part was that he chugged it about 8pm and was up until about 3am. At about that time he was out cold until about 5pm the next day.

So if you like energy drinks - this is apparently a high power drink with low calories so those of you who are attempting to lose weight - this won't break the caloric bank. It can't hurt to give it a try, though availability may be an issue as they haven't shown up on the market shelves around here yet.

These are delicious and soft sour gummy worms, which come in two bags of four and a half pounds each. The flavors are lemon and a red cherryish flavor, lemon and green apple, and orange and blue raspberry, which is a rather odd flavor combination. The best thing about these gummy worms is that they are sour all the way through, so you can bite them or suck on them without all the sour going away. Would buy again.

not the best toffee i have had, but pretty close. packaging was damaged and had some water damage from cold pack placed inside to keep chocolate from melting, and chocolates looked like they were thrown in, but i know that delevery via the mail wouldn't make it beautiful.. haha.. fast shipping, great people to work with, highly recommend

I love this mix.  The best muffin mix I have found.  It also makes great pancakes, waffles, and banana bread.  I send it to my daughter wherever she is stationed around the world.  You can't beat it if you like to or have to bake, especially for kids.

ProfileName: Michael L. Love "free is a verb"
Summary: a fine product from a savvy company
Text:
Be warned that these chips have NO SALT. That is what I want, so that I can taste the interesting flavor of this unique variety of corn, unadulterated by unhealthful sodium. The blue color is not a artificial chemical coloring, but healthful anthocyanins. This corn is a great source of these compounds, which have been demonstrated to have immense and healthful benefits. Highly recommended, especially for corn lovers!

Regards,
proclus
[...]
If you like tender jerky with a nice kick to it then I recommend Jack Links Carne Seca.  It's fresh, tasty and a good value.

I purchased this to use with my Bialetti Moka, and it is delicious!

I like to use 2 to 3 heaping teaspoons in my 6-cup maker, and it makes enough for two (large) lattes.

It reminds me of working in Starbucks...that smell of delicious brewing coffee and espresso!

(Unlike Starbucks coffee, however, this coffee is smooth and doesn't taste burnt at all.)

The packaging was a bit smaller than expected, but a little sure goes a long way!
Someone I knew from South Africa introduced me to the British Bird's Custard Powder. Great for quick desserts and tastes MUCH better than American INSTANT puddings.  I highly recommend it!!!

The quality of Marshalls Creeks Marjoram is less than ideal though it is not horrible. The "sealed" container is not really "sealed at all" I had spider webs and mold (somehow) in some other herbs I purchased from them.  Of the herbs purchased the Marjoram and Chives were essentially the only usable herbs.  Purchase at your own risk

Summary: Read this if you have keratosis piliarisis!!!
Text:
This gets rid of your KP! I have a bad case of KP ever since I was younger. It is so embarrassing and people always asked what was wrong with the skin on my upper arms.

I was willing to try anything because nothing, no cream, no scrub has gotten rid of it until I tried coconut oil. I wish I could tell the world about how this has been miracle for me.

Trust me just buy it :)

I ordered this tea last year and liked it very much. I now like to try it on my friends. I like to see their expressions when they taste it's not the normal expected tea drink here in the South.  They say it's very smooth tasting. I drink mine unsweetened. But if sweetened, it still has a very smooth taste that has them coming back for more and asking what kind of tea it is.  Works for me. At least try it. Can't beat the price either.

This was a great price and I lurve anything truffle. This was just ok. It's truffly, but also has something else I can't place my finger on, but that I don't like. The white truffle sea salt is a better investment.

Way too expensive for a small package. Shipping weight claims eight pounds you receive a 6oz package.
I feel ripped off.

I drink this tea all day long. Hard to find in stores, so was thrilled to see it on Amazon. It has a light flavor, and I actually let the bag steep for several minutes before drinking. Perfect by itself or with honey and a dot of cream. Yum!

I love this instant coffee. My family is from Jamaica too, and this is what I remember drinking at breakfast. Breakfast was always just so: balmy mornings, red checkered table cloth, eggs, toast, papaya, and a cup of coffee. Mountain Peak has a nice mild flavour - not over done and overbearing like other instant coffees.

I love having a Larabar for breakfast each day. The banana bread flavor is delicious and full of healthy fruit and nuts, but after eating the whole pack, I was a little tired of it. Next time, I'm springing for apple pie.

My son loves these puffs. They are organic, contain very low sugar, and even the container is bpa free. I have had a few problems with the lids popping off which resulted in lost puffs and sometimes the puffs go stale quickly. I contacted the manufacturer and was told that they were aware of the problem and have since fixed it. I have yet to receive a new shipment to test it out.

Summary: Miracle food for pets with skin conditions
Text:
I cannot say enough good about this dogfood - it is nothing short of miraculous. We have a Westie with the classic bad skin, itchy, hot spots. We have tried untold types of medication for month on end from the vet. We even tried lamb food, garlic tablets, brewers yeast - everything under the sun.

It was so bad that she carried her right foot up off the ground and hopped on 3 feet, she slept a lot and didn't interact with us much. In desperation, my husband bought this food. Thank goodness, because I know I wouldn't have. I wouldn't have believed that just switching her diet could make such a dramatic change.

Before we made it through the first bag, the hair was growing back on her foot, she was running and playing with her buddy, and "talking" to use again.

She is a different dog after 2 bags - I've never seen anything like it, and I tell everyone about this food.

If you have a pet with those coat conditions, just try it - its cheaper than the meds from the vet!

They where given as a Christmas presant to my father-in-law, and he really did like them. He is a hard man to buy for so when my husband saw  this we thought of his dad, because he likes them. Thank you for a very nice Christmas presant for my father-in-law, because his a very good man and I like to give him something he likes.

Love these chips.  They are perfectly seasoned and of course have no grease at all.  There is also not the cardboard taste of a baked chipped.  The popped texture of the potatoes is nice and light. They are only 100 calories a bag, but there are lots of chips in the bag so it's a great snack.  The ingredient list is also pretty wholesome without any strange chemicals added.  Fav flavor is probably salt and pepper or bbq.

Summary: My dog is not a fan.
Text: I'm not sure what all the rave reviews are about. My small dog doesn't really like them. And she's not exactly a picky eater. I gave them 2 stars instead of 1 because she'll eat it, but she always seems a little unsure of whether she wants it or not. And that's weird. She'd prefer a bite of a real apple to these any day.

Summary: Lucky Country Licorice, Black Cherry 16 oz tubs (pack of 4)
Text:
Lucky Country Licorice, black cherry 16 oz tubs (pack of 4)... This candy is the best I have ever tasted, my last order was my third (3rd), it is realy good and may be habit forming to your tast buds.

There are several items to choose from, which can be confusing. The best value is the 4-16oz tubs,4 lbs total vs the 1.5 pound package, they are both the same price. I found this to be wrong, on the part of Amazon to allow this to happen. I did not send the 1.5 lbs bag back, it wasn't worth my time, and I do like the candy...

I live in Gainesville FL, not Zoe KY.

Summary: Raw Healthy Freeze dried snack ...but so expensive
Text:
Nature's Variety Snacks seem to have the right ingredients. My dogs were barely interested in the treats.
I'm not an animal nutritionist but I've always known that cats need more protein than dogs.
Granted this is just a treat but I would think that is why few treats and designed
for dogs/cats. I was shocked to realize at the current price these treat cost over $43 per pound.
Why not save money and buy your pets Filet mignon or the finest wild Alaskan Salmon.
I'm exaggerating of course but I hope you get my point. You could buy a food dehydrator
and make your own beef or chicken treats for your pet.

I'm not a coffee snob. If I was, I doubt I'd own a Keurig. I just want a decent tasting cup of coffee with little cleanup.

I've tried many of the flavored coffees, but they're too gimmicky for me. Starbucks brand tastes burnt to me, even their blonde roast -- in stores I mean, I have not tried the Starbucks brand kcups.

I like this breakfast blend because it's not too dark, not too light. It tastes like what no-frills coffee should taste like. I order the biggest size to get the best value.

Update: I just tried to create a review for the "Jamaica Me Crazy" coconut flavor, which I thought was terrible. (And I *love* coconut.) I should specify that the original review was for "Breakfast in Bed."
Very pleased with this product. This is not the first time I have purchased Green Mountain Coffee and it wont be the last.
This sweet drop is a delightful, healthy alternative to sugar and other bad for you artifical sweetners. SweetLeaf stevia is my favorite brand of stevia.

I received this product and immediately noticed that the grading is off. The product I received seems to be a broken orange pekoe grade. It does not resemble the picture AT ALL (which does represent a TGFOP grade). All in all, I have found the tea to be pleasant tasting, not overly tannic, plenty of body. But I ordered and paid for a higher grade of tea. It's not acceptable to furnish an inferior grade of tea.
Good tasting and reasonably filling soup.  One drawback:  IF YOU ARE ARTHRITIC OR SUCH, BE VERY CAREFULLY WHEN OPENING THE SOUP.
I enjoy several of the Shake and Bake crusts and the Ranch and Herb Crusted one is by far the worst.  My wife and I put it on chicken and it was terrible.  Do not buy this item.

Summary: Mild Coffee with Cream and Sugar
Text:
Based on another customer's review I took the plunge! I previously had Korean 3-n-1 coffee individual packets. Each containing instant coffee, creamer, sugar to make one cup. I purchased the Taster's Choice version previously Nescafe Taster's Choice Mild Original Mix 24/20pc - PMO, 8.5-Ounce (Pack of 4) via Amazon. It's just the Amazon availability is very hit or miss. This Classic Mix tastes similar to a mild Cafe con Leche or Cappuccino

I just received my order and am now drinking my second cup ....mmm... mild coffee light with cream and sugar. Brings back memories of stopping by my old favorite East Coast Diner on the way to work in the pre-Starbucks era. This product imported from Korea is absolutely splendid AND you cannot beat the price which is also pre-Starbucks...100 cups of coffee with cream and sugar for ELEVEN BUCKS and no wasted pots of coffee either! You just need hot water and you're good to go. :-)
If you are looking to watch the amount of sugar you use, this is a fine product.

When vacationing Adam and Barbara Maitland meet their demise when they are killed by a local dog,(don't worry, you'll laugh your head off at this,) they are transported into a world of mystery. Tim Burton takes you an a hilarious journey into the afterlife. Danny Elfman once again pairs up with Tim so they can work their movie magic, creating a roller coaster of a movie score. Beetlejuice will leave you laughing 'til you cry,(or just crying.)
Great and as advertised. Item was shipped on time and the material is pretty good. I have been buying this for last year or so and taste really good. Recommend this item.

This coffee is great and I have had my Senseo for years. I am unable to find the pods locally anymore, so on subscribe and save through Amazon. Love the foam on top of the coffee, I don't even want regular coffee anymore since I found Senseo years ago.

Summary: Quick and easy to use and low in calories
Text:
First of all, Chicken of the Sea's Pink Salmon tastes great and it is easy to use for a quick topping on a salad or at lunch. The health benefits are strong as well with the omega 3 but also the entire packet is only 70 calories and is low in fat as well.

This si a great on the go container and we would buy again.

I love coffee with no bitterness and lots of good coffee taste and this one fits the bill. Holds up well to milk & sugar-I love it in the morning for the first cup and in the evening just as much. Definitely would buy it again.
I was so excited to find this product, but I was very disappointed. It's has a plastic taste. It doesn't even deserve one star.

well it's a fave thing for my bf.. but i guess its a lil too small for a big KID like him..
ITS A GOOD BUY THOUGH!

Summary: Better Ingredients But More Room For Improvement
Text: I received a sample bag as a BzzAgent. I should first say that both of my dogs LOVED this food. They gobbled it up and didn't have any problems with digestion or itching, etc. I was happy to see that the first ingredient was real chicken. You can also compare your current dog food with Ideal Balance on this handy chart located here: [..] I am excited that the first ingredient is real chicken but I wish this product did not also contain chicken meal.

I got a sample of this in the mail and it is just incredibly tasty. Generally I don't like coconut but here I felt it really added to the different textures of all the grains in the bar. It reminded me a little bit of muesli bars. Anyway, for it's size I was quite pleased - I feel full (satisfied) after eating it! All the while when I was eating the bar I couldn't help commenting on how tasty it was, and how the various subtle flavors and textures of the ingredients came through.

I had never tried Farro before, but had a recipe that called for it and could not find it locally.  Our family is trying to eat healthier and so I am trying various whole grain products.  I made a cold salad with the cooked Farro and it was a very nice product.  It had a great texture and and mild, nutty flavor.  I also held it's texture well for several days in the cold salad. We would definitely use Farro again and though I can't compare this Farro to other brands it worked great for our needs.

When I moved to the U.K. about fifteen years ago I came across Yorkshire Tea. There are lots of tea brands available in British supermarkets (far more than you'll find in the U.S.)and I tried several of them. However, I found Yorkshire Tea to be the best. It makes a good strong cup of tea with with a fine aroma. It's also economical-4 level teaspoons make 6 cups of great tea. But, please, brew it the right way. Use fresh cold water and bring it to the boil-not 200 degrees or 205 degrees but boiling at 212. Let it steep for 5 minutes, give it a good stir and pour it into the cup. I drink it with milk-no sugar. Try it your way. You won't be disappointed.

Summary: Tasty, but a tad too strong for me
Text: While I should have realized that "Jet Fuel" was probably describing pretty strong coffee, this tastes fine, but the aftertaste is just too much.  I prefer a medium roast, but if you like it strong, you will enjoy.

****
Stash's Chamomile Caffeine Free Herbal Tea is one of their totally natural teas, containing only chamomile flowers. Although I do like this, it means that the tea is rather weak, but still a fine tea---just use two teabags. Many people will find this tea too subtle. I think that Stash's more natural teas seem to be a little mild and undistinguished, while their flavored teas are super-powerful, erring on the side of too powerful, overwhelming the tea drinker with all types of strong added flavorings. If I had to pick, I'd always take subtle, as you can make these teas, like this chamomile tea, stronger by doubling up on the bags, but you can't make the strongly flavored teas weaker!

Stash Tea has been around for over 35 years, and they are moving in the direction of more organic and loose teas, more true flavors instead of added flavorings. I appreciate that their chamomile is so pure, but wish it could be a little more flavorful.

Still, recommended.
****

I have to quit drinking coffee as I have horrible caffiene reactions. I love the taste of coffee though. I've tried hazelnut and mocha so far and both are tasty. Hazelnut has a bit stronger flavor but mocha is good too. Even my kids liked it when they tasted it. I think its a great alternative and better for you.

Just like the other review...ordered the Red tin and got Prodomo in a dark blue tin.  Totally different coffees.  I have ordered for many years from GermanDeli.com and know all the Dallmayr coffees.  This Prodomo is a nice mild, smooth coffee, but I prefer the much bolder coffees. Of the 4 cans I received, 2 were dented because the 2 packs were loose in the box without any bubble wrap. From past experience I expect better from Amazon.com. I won't bother to return..too much hassle, but if it happens again my business will go somewhere where my order is filled correctly.
Our dog loves this food, mixed with a bit of dry food.  The price is definitely right and he gobbles it up- a win win!

I never once had a problem with bread not rising since switching to Saf-Yeast.  There is a Saf "Gold" specifically for bread with high sugar content but in my experience, the "Red" works just fine.  It has a 3+ years shelf life if stored in an air-tight container in the freezer. Great product!

Summary: BEST PODS OUT OF ALL OF THEM!
Text: I ordered the variety pack which is very good.  But, in the variety pack was Sumatra.  Sumatra is winner HANDS DOWN!  Just buy Sumatra and look no further.  I tried all of the coffees (light, medium, dark roast, variety pack).
My dog, of course, adores these - anything with cheese is his favorite.  However, they gave him considerable amounts of gas.  We will, however, try other Wellness treats to see if they work better.

Very good olive mix.  Olives are high quality, very firm. Good flavor.  Not too salty.  The capers were also really good. We kept in fridge after opening, and they were gone in 2-3 weeks.  Will definitely reorder.

My cat had a very bad reaction to these treats. He loved them, but they were like an extreme laxative. It took me a while to track down his problem. Maybe it was the chlorophyll, I don't know, but if your cat has a sensitive stomach, I'd be careful with these particular treats.

ProfileName: N. Ferguson "Two, Daisy, Hannah, and Kitten"
Summary: NO waste at all ----  great for training  ----  all dogs love liver treats
Text:
Freeze dried liver has a hypnotic effect on dogs. They LOVE it and will do just about anything for it, so it is a great treat to use for training. (Powdered freeze dried liver is even added to many dog medicines nowadays-- heartworm and arthritis tablets, etc.-- because it causes the dog to scarf the medicine down like a treat.)

Freeze dried liver has a dry, hard, yet powdery/easy to chew consistency. It comes chopped/cubed. It is extremely lightweight due to the fact there is so little moisture in the product (thus the low weights on product labels).

Even though your dog will love liver treats, you shouldn't overfeed it. The manufacturer recommends 1-2 cubes daily for small dogs, 2-3 cubes for medium dogs, and 3-4 cubes for large dogs.

The largest package sizes of liver treats tend to be far more economical. I recommend buying the larger tubs, as you will save lots of money, you'll have a handy treat supply around for a longer time, and your dog will never tire of this product.

There is really zero waste with this product. When you near the end of the tub you'll find some powdery bits of dried liver at the bottom. Your dogs will go CRAZY if you sprinkle this dust over their dog food-- it's a wonderful reward that is easy to use.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Here's the nutritional analysis:

-100% freeze dried liver
-NO additives or preservatives.

-Crude protein..... not less than 50%
-Crude fat..... not less than 5%
-Crude fiber..... not more than 3%
-Moisture..... not more than 6%
Wonderful tastey and filling meal for my husband and myself when we want something quick and easy.  We tried it from the grocery but then couldn't find it again so we ordered a case.
I agree with JChan!!!  A Californian transplanted to Washington D.C., I cannot find this anywhere!  It is the best sauce ever.  It's kind of like spicy ketchup, and AWESOME on everything!

Summary: Love the product, need better shipping
Text: I splash vita coco in my water, easier to drink water.  I am staying hydrated for once in my life! and no more leg cramps!  Problem- so far there is one box that is always busted in the shipping.  Need to get that fixed.

Four and One-Half Stars

This coffee's packaging is a send-up of Jamaican style down to its name: Marley Coffee. (By the way, I actually saw Bob Marley walking by himself on West 57th Street in the late seventies). Anyway, this coffee is meant for Pod coffee makers - did not realize this when I requested the coffee. I do not own a pod coffeemaker. You get 15 individual pod packets. Each pod holds a single serving/cup of coffee. To enable brewing in my coffee maker, I just cut the pods open and dumped into a coffee filter, and voila! Coffee has nice rich aroma, and it has a full flavor. It's definitely a better coffee than I had been drinking, which was your basic old school supermarket stuff. For reference, I am not someone who tolerates strong coffee well. Starbucks can give me a panic attack! So, I thought the kick and richness was very nice and just right for me.

As others have commented, if you're into that deep & dark, caffeine laden French roast, this may not be the coffee for you.

Summary: Healthy and nice snack size for my children.
Text: My children like the cherry and apple the best.  I like the strawberry and cherry, but all of them taste great compared to other brands.  Healthy and safe snacks don't have to taste bad and my kids have not grown tired of these for a while now.  That says alot.

I've just tried this seasoning this morning and it tastes super good. I actually went back to my room to cook more white rice just to eat with it, a little soy sauce (very little), few drops of sesame oil and a little bit of chili sauce (sriracha). It was one of the best meal I've ever eaten. The aroma of the seasoning when it hits the hot white rice makes my room feel very cozy.
Fabulous!  I take one to work with me every day.  I feel deprived without my daily bar!

Summary: ONE OF THE GREATEST TEAS ON PLANET EARTH!
Text: I shall not go into unnecessary detail.  Simply stated, if you enjoy fine tea, Twining's English Breakfast is one of the VERY BEST on the market.  And, Amazon's price is incredible:  less than half the price of grocery store cost.  Try it and you will be a loyal customer forever!

Summary: Really nutty, but melts to the packaging
Text: I'm excited to try the other KIND bars. I am looking for a low carb and more natural snack bars and I think KIND is a very good choice for that. The Almond Cashew + Omega 3 is pretty good, although I haven't found a great number of cashews. I've had it in rather hot places and it does kind of lose its shape. That's annoying. Purchasing it through amazon.com was a breeze, I enjoyed having 12 at once and saving. This stuff is okay to buy in bulk because you can consume it so quickly.

After buying this once, I realized how full of junk it was, like hydrogenated oil, thickeners like guar gum, and corn syrup solids, plus stuff I can't spell, let alone pronounce. So now I just buy lactaid milk and it works fine.

I was hoping for something that had extra vitamins in it and maybe omega-3s, but no such luck. Whiskas missed an opportunity here.

Update: I've upgraded my kitten lactaid milk to include taurine from capsules (jarrow), and whey based amino acid digest, I think it's called Amino Gold or something, meant for sports people. I also add a little bit of "miralax" Kirkland LaxaClear, 90 Daily Doses, Polyethylene Glycol 3350 (3 Pack), Compare to Miralax Active Ingredient but only a little bit. Of all these things, I add a tiny tiny bit. My cats weigh about 10 lbs each, so figure 20 lbs of feeding, that's about 1/5 of a 100 lb teenager. I also water it down about 1:3 parts water:lactaid.

They LOVE it, beg for it. Two cups of it is gone in a day. Be prepared to clean the litterbox every night though. But it's good for them to be hydrated. I haven't decided how to get more Omega-3 into this yet. Maybe add almond milk? They seem to like almonds and are after me if I eat them.

Jarrow Formulas Taurine 1,000mg Capsules, 100-Count

Ultimate Nutrition Amino Gold Capsules, 1000 mg, 250-Count Bottles

They drink it between meals.
Did I mention cats like parmesan cheese? I'm considering adding parmesan as a flavorant to make it even more irresistible. They already get "chicken parm" every other day:

AvoDerm Natural Chicken Chunks Entree in Gravy Cat Food - 24 3-Ounce Cans

Kraft 100% Real Parmesan Cheese - 24 oz. container
It's great to find a grain free product that is actually appealing to my cats.  They are excited about food again.

Summary: Excellent choice for my finicky feline!
Text: Since my elderly cat has started eating a wet food diet, she's become extremely finicky. She used to eat anything I'd put in front of her, until about a year ago when she decided nothing was good enough.  I'd been through every brand in the store...she doesn't like fish, plain chicken or lamb so my choices were limited.  When I found this, I gave it a try since she primarily likes beef. The ingredients were excellent and I read great reviews from Vets about it online.  She has been scarfing this food down from day 1 and still loves it. There are peas and carrots in it and the  consistency of it is very mushy. She likes it that way, so she doesn't have to chew much. I also noticed it doesn't dry out if there's any left in her bowl for several hours, like other brands have.  I definitely plan to continue giving this to her. I've been ordering on Amazon since it's been difficult to find it in my local pet stores lately.

Dogswell Vitality Chicken Breast are healthy and tasty treats that are not just good for my dog, but she loves them. All I have to say is "chicken strips?" and she goes crazy for them. I also found that I could purchase this product on Amazon for half the price that I would pay in a pet store.

Dogswell Vitality Chicken Breast, 5-Ounce Orange Pouches (Pack of 6)

Bought these as a gift for someone that loves Malted Milk balls. Should have asked before assuming they WERE Cookie flavored malted milk balls as pictured. They aren't...They are small blobs of cookie dough that is covered in chocolate.

Summary: Not As Good as the Grove Square Caramel Cappucino Flavor
Text:
I bought my son a huge variety of Kcups to go with his new Keurig coffee maker. After tasting about 20 flavors so far, this is the only one that we didn't love. It's not disgusting, but it's just not too flavorful. It had an odd aftertaste to it. We also bought the Grove Square Caramel Cappuccino and I thought that flavor was 10x better.

We'll use these up, but I probably won't purchase this flavor again.

I'm so glad to have found this tea on Amazon.  It is one of my favorites and is nearly impossible to find in the grocery stores.  It is really delicious--a mild orange taste with just a hint of spice.  Yummy!

The baby loves this. She would eat the whole pouch at one sitting if allowed.
If you are looking to get your baby to eat fruits and vegetables with minimal added stuff -- this is the one to get!

Summary: Ok, but should really call all these apple fruit ropes.
Text: I bought these as a sweet treat for lunch boxes. Cliff is a favorite at our house, so I wasn't too concerned about quality. When I got these and read the ingredients, I was completely miffed that all 3 flavors have no other substance but apple. I will probably go back to buying the stretch island fruit because they actually include in the ingredients the fruit that is the flavor on the front label.

I enjoy the product very much, it does exactly what it says it is supposed to do.  It's disgusting to think I ate fruit without it all my life.  My only problem is that half a bottle of the Fit was spilled upon arrival.

Summary: Horribly spicy/hot, overpowering ginger taste with no lemon, followed directions exactly
Text:
I was happy to try this tea out, hoping it would help with my occasional morning sickness. I've had success with lemon tea or with ginger cookies in the past, so had high hopes. But, I can't stomach this tea when well, and there is no way I could manage it if nauseated!

First of all, I followed package directions as to the amount of water to add, so it was as strong as it was supposed to be. I tasted no lemon, nothing but ginger, lots and lots of ginger. It was very spicy hot. Enough that it burned my mouth for a minute or two after taking one sip. Same thing with the next sip.

Do not buy this tea unless you have drunk STRONG ginger tea before and know that you like it. And expect this tea to be very spicy hot. And don't expect any lemon flavor. Personally, I thought it was absolutely horrible.

The item came just as described and the delivery was on time. Everything went well. This is a great alternative for those who do not own a vehicle and can't make a stop to the groceries (especially college students like me xD).

I bought the Everlasting Treat Ball (Large sized) for my 45 lb mixed breed dog, who is an aggressive chewer. This is the same dog that went through a red Kong in a day, and a Kong Extreme in a few months, and will liquefy any tennis ball in seconds. I heard great reviews on this and read about it in a book as well, and after MONTHS of debate decided to pick this up at my local pet store when it was on sale. I just gave it to her less than 20 minutes ago and she already has several chunks out of it.

It did "challenge" her for a few minutes, as I put kibble and treats inside. She got the disk out in a few minutes and enjoyed that (chicken flavor) then went crazy getting at the food inside. So crazy, that she has taken several chunks out of the plastic already. And eaten them. Great. She did seem to have fun rolling it around getting the food out, but then went to chewing on the plastic.

For a replacement, I got the Everlasting Fun Ball Large in large from the same company- and its been over a week so far and she loves that toy!!! Its basically the same thing as this instead it is actually a green ball with more room for treats inside, and made of more durable material. Also, unlike the treat ball, it does not have any ridges for my dog to bite into and rip pieces off. And, its a bit cheaper. I'm writing this after I've had that ball for at least 6 months, and she plays with it EVERY DAY and there isn't even a mark in the thing.

So, all in all, skip this and go for the FUN BALL instead!!!

These bars are awesome! I first tried them at Starbucks, where they cost $2.45 each, plus tax. Amazons price is $1.48 each, almost one dollar in savings! I eat these for breakfast on the go, or for a quick pick me in the afternoon. The Mango/Macadamia Nut are the only ones i have tried so far, but I absolutly plan on trying the other flavors.
It gives gluten free chocolate lovers joy.  It is easy to make and much more fun to eat. My oven tends to dry out the cake, so watch the time and test.

I've been trying a number of different kinds of stevia, both liquid and powder. This one is my favorite. It has a very neutral taste and one tiny spoon of it is perfect in a big glass of oolong hibiscus iced tea. A heaping tiny spoon of it is perfect in a chocolate/banana/soy milk smoothie. I originally got it to put in something called "mega muffins" but managed to use up an entire 1 oz container of it without even making the muffins and have had to order more. I really like that it's organic. I've been trying different sweeteners in my hibiscus oolong iced tea, and this is not only better than any other stevia product I've found, but works better than any other sweetener as well. Even regular granulated sugar. It dissolves pretty much instantly. I'm thinking about ordering the 1 lb size (although that would probably last me about two years) I just wonder if that size comes with the teeny tiny spoon!

These have a great combination of salt and vinegar which makes neither aspect overwhelming. They are insanely addictive and they go well with dried fruits like raisins to give some contrast to the salt. They are also high in fiber which makes up for their fat content to some extent.

I have been taking this for several days on the advice of my acupuncturist and it has not had any effect on my chronic muscle pain and also has caused me to have loose bowls when going number 2 in the bathroom.

does anybody know of a product that can help get lactic acid build up out of muscles?

Summary: Light, Fresh, Great Flavor, Not Too Sweet
Text:
Fans of the Q Tonic will love this Ginger Ale. Like the other Q products it's sweetened with Agave Nectar. This is it not as sweet (nor nearly as high in calories) as a traditional ginger ales you find in your local super markets. The flavor profile is complex with a slight real ginger bite. I find it is great as both a cocktail and mocktail mixer as well as good all by it self.

What I like: Taste, Light profile, Mix-ability
What I don't like: Price

Summary: Delicious, but not as pictured, and take note...
Text:
These are delicious butter toffee almonds. There's just the right amount of saltiness and sweetness that you simply can't put them down. They're even better if you warm them up just a bit - they become more aromatic and the toffee simply melts in your mouth.

Don't expect anything like what you see in the picture, however. The toffee is a little clumpy and inconsistent, as it usually is on butter almond toffees. The picture looks like what these might look like before the toffee has dried, but you would never clump them in a bowl like that before they were dry... it's not clear why that picture even exists.

Also, of note: Lang's Chocolates is the company, and Butter Toffee Almonds are the product. Don't buy this if you were expecting chocolate toffee almonds. Those are another treat completely - there is no confectioner's sugar or chocolate on these.

I was looking forward to receiving this order. Almonds, macadamias, and walnuts! Sounded delicious.
Then I tried one, and was puzzled. Yes, I could taste some almond, but WOW, the main flavor was PEANUTS. The ingredients list peanuts as the largest amount of nuts. This should be called the Peanut, Almond Bar. If one likes to have the main flavor of a nut bar as peanuts, you will enjoy this.
The quality of KIND products I appreciate, as well as the low GI, the natural properties, and having a healthier choice. But honesty in advertising and product would be appreciated.

I was disappointed with the deception, and the unexpectedly strong flavor of peanuts, as I purchased it for the nuts I like best, which were supposed to be the main source of nut protein.
Let's get honest KIND!

This is very good tasting herbal coffee. The chocolate mint is my favorite flavor of all of the herbal coffees.This brews just like coffee and sometimes i mix regular coffee with it. I also add almond milk to it and it gives it a good taste...
This tea lacks the distinctive Scottish breakfast tea malt flavor. It is not bad, but no better than much less expensive teas.

This is a higher quality chamomile tea than, say, Celestial Seasonings but is NOT the one they sell at Starbucks.  Beware.  This is a dried, chopped tea with a different recipe and different amounts of ingredients than the same label at a Starbucks, and the tea is in "filterbags."  Just look at the ingredient list to see.  I don't know why Tazo sells this; it's confusing and piggybacks on the reputation that the beautiful whole leaf teas with their intense flavor have.  If you want the ones from Starbucks, order Tazo "full leaf" teas which are something like a dime more per bag; well worth it.

ProfileName: Ms. Tess L. Brantley "Tess Brantley cat lover"
Text: These bars are great as is your company. I love to get these bars, they are good to have when you just want a little something sweet, not too many cals.

Summary: Good entry in the K-cup portfolio
Text:
Caribou makes a series of coffees; my current favorite is Mahogany. However, this, too is nice on the palate. The package describes the taste thus: "Caribou blend begins with a delightful heaviness on your palate and finishes with a relaxing balance of bittersweet chocolate and fruity flavors."

For tree huggers and environmentalists, Caribou--as a company--is a member of the Rainforest Alliance, designed to "protect ecosystems and the people and wildlife that depend on them. . . ."

The coffee? I like it. It is not my favorite K-cup product, but it is tasty. I would have preferred a bit more boldness to the taste, but it is smooth and has a nice aftertaste.

If you've entered the Keurig world, this might well be worth trying out. . . .
Seriously, can you think of a better combination? Cilantro and pesto. Our family adores this product. A for sure part of our staples from now on.

Summary: Lot of food for a little one
Text: I got 3 sets of food for my 6 month old to have some variety.  I didn't realize kids are on stage 1 foods for a very brief period so we had to mix these stage 1 foods in with stage 2 and 3 foods to use them. I'm sure these are great if you have multiple children, but for one child, these packs are too large to get more than one, but one box doesn't provide variety...

I will recommend this product to everyone who drinks wine or even those who just started to try wine.  This gadget can make a bottle of wine go down smoothly, it takes the "acidity" of the wine away and therefore, the wine taste very smooth when you drink it.  I am saying this because I'm not a wine drinker, but I can tell the difference when 2 glasses of wine was put in front of me to try, one glass of wine was pour through the Aerator and the other wasn't.  I was able to tell right away which one was lighter and smoother, and that was the glass of wine that was pour through the Aerator.  I love the product so much that I've bought the red and wine Vinturi Wine Aerator as a Christmas present for my in-laws this year.  The other thing that I forgot to mention is that it is a great product to take it with you as it comes with a travel pouch, you can definately show off to your friends and believe me, this will be a centre piece for conversation where the social gathering is.

The texture is exactly what the other vegan/vegetarian jerky companies (that i've tried) went wrong on..Vegan dream jerky got it to almost perfectly mimic the jerky I remember from my meat eating days. Unfortunately, those other companies got one thing right that vegan dream just didn't quite get right for the most part: taste. I was looking forward to trying each of them, and I started with teriyaki. My girlfriend said it tasted like paper, and that was surprisingly accurate..Next I tried the hot chili pepper. I was excited about it because I LOVE hot foods. It was both not very good and a huge disappointment as far as spice goes. Not very hot at all, not very great tasting. Next was the hickory pepper..This was by far my favorite, and I will probably be placing an order for JUST this one soon. Last was the cowgirl..It claims "hint o' spice, hint o' sweet" but I got a hint o' neither of those things..Taste was very bland

All in all the hot chili pepper, teriyaki, and cowgirl tasted almost exactly the same and I do not plan on buying any of them again..As stated, I will most likely be buying the hickory pepper again, and it is the only one of the 4 that I would suggest to anybody..I was going to give this a 1 or 2 star, but the hickory alone made it worth a 3.

Summary: Loved it till plastic, added flavors and concentrate were brought in
Text:
How do you kill a good product ?
Well, bring Coke and they know how to take nature's pure coconut water, add a bunch of flavors, destroy the taste and package them in genuine plastic.

Sorry, I will go for another product..
I love Hemp and this stuff tastes great.  I add it to cereal, smoothies and veggies.

AS A NEW DIABETIC WITH BOTH FIBROMYALGIA AND CHRONIC FATIGUE, I HAD A HUGE IMPETUS TO IMPROVE MY DIET. AFTER SOME SIGNIFICANT HOURS RESEARCHING, I REALIZED I HAD TO GET AWAY FROM THE ARTIFICIAL SWEETENERS. SO I DECIDED TO TRY THIS. IT DOES TAKE A BIT OF GETTING USED TO FLAVOR WISE, BEING SO USED TO THE SWEETNESS OF THE ARTIFICIALS, BUT IT IS WONDERFUL AND THREE OTHER PRODUCT ORDERS LATER I AM STILL VERY VERY SATISFIED.

ProfileName: M. Wright "Ua Mau ke Ea o ka Aina i ka Pono"
Text: My cat doesn't like this food that much but she'll eat way more of it than the KD food the vet prescribed. This food has a nugget texture which my cat prefers to the mush of the KD. I mix this 50/50 with an organic canned chicken type and my kitty is fairly happy.

I am thrilled to be able to purchase these through Amazon here in the United States! As the previous reviewers have said, it is a popular brand in Germany and Europe, and for good reason. It is my family's favorite chocolate. Milka, as the name implies, has a creamy mouth-feel and is not overly sweet. It is the kind of chocolate you will savor, more than a typical American vending machine sugar fix. Try it!

I have been a faithful drinker of Weavers french roast and have always been impressed with the flavor and freshness of their beans. I gave the weavers sumatra and was blown away by this brew.  You will not be disappointed. Highest recommendation.

I too wanted to love this formula because i believed it was better for my little one.  however, we also experienced issues with constipation.  my poor baby was in so much pain that she would cry.  the smell was good and the consistency was good too, however it just didn't work my baby's tummy.  we have used other formulas and she has not gotten constipated with those.  she has also been exclusively breastfed for about 3-4 months with no constipation issues.  she is now going on 5 months and i am only supplementing here and there with formula.

picture of the product looked good - when i recieved it the individual candies were all upside down & a complete mess.  the cardboard strap holding the candies together was almost completely ripped. the crate was all chipped & discolored. i would never order or recommend this to anyone. i never did recieve the other 3.90 shipping charges i was entitled to .

I received 3 sample bottles of 5-Hour Energy from Smiley 360...and LOVED this product! I loved how the taste was pleasant and there was no strong aftertaste like most products have. It also was fast acting, gave me the energy I needed and I never experienced that 'crash' you would get with caffeine or sugar. I am not a coffee drinker, and have tried to stay away from caffeine because I always seem to feel worse off than I did before taking it. But with 5-Hour energy, I can use it as often as I need and don't have to worry about regretting it later! It also got me through most of my (BORING) day at work without making me jittery or jumpy. Thanks 5-Hour Energy! You have got a fan for life!! :-)

(I received a free sample of 5-Hour Energy from Smiley360.com)

I ordered this as a Christmas gift for a friend that loves Kit-Kat bars. The bars were good but they did not come in the retail packaging as pictured, which was largely disappointing. Instead they came packaged loosely with popcorn material in an unmarked cardboard box.

I can't say enough about Orgain! It is by far the best meal replacement/protein shake I have tried (and I've tried them all). My husband and I each have at least one per day, for breakfast and occasionally after a workout.  I have purchased Orgain on "subscribe and save" for several months, and have encouraged many others to do so as well.  They are delicious and convenient. Thank you Orgain for delivering a superior product at a great price!
The salt is too humid, but the taste is okay. I am thinking about heating it in oven. See if it's gonna get dry.

I am so happy to see someone making snacks without high fructose corn syrup!  It is hard to find quick snacks for my son.  Corn syrup is in practically everything now days and I appreciate someone making the effort to make something that tastes good and pleases the kids as well as mom.  Best of all - my son loves them!

Summary: A perfect "Anytime" coffee that is sure to please.
Text:
I have tried many, many brands and blends in my Keurig coffee maker and this is definetely one of my favorites. The type of coffe I drink depends on my mood. Sometimes I want a strong, bold cup like, Newman's Own Extra-bold Special Blend K-cups, 80 Pk for Keurig Brewers and sometimes I want something more mild like, Green Mountain K-Cup Single-Serving Coffee 108-ct.- Nantucket Blend But ever since I have had my Keurig I have been looking for one of my favorite coffees. The Dunkin Donut brand.

This coffee is superb and very much like the Dunkin Donut brand. Not bold or bitter. Not weak or under flavored. It is smooth and very flavorful. It is the perfect crowd pleasing blend for any time of day or night.

I have shopped all over and you can't beat the variety or the price here on Amazon when you join their club. A great value.

I do wish that Amazon would change the name by removing "Extra Bold". It is not. It is, at most, a medium roast. Even when brewed with the smallest setting of the Keurig I would not concider it bold. It comes out great on the medium size setting. Very remanicent of that great cup of Joe you would get in the old days at your favorite diner.

The grandchildren really like them and so do the adults.  The bars are great snacks and healthy. They have a touch of sweetness and you can't go wrong with pecans. They make a good after school snack with a glass of milk.

Summary: Good cookies... Order filler AND tummy filler!
Text: I must confess I bought these cookies just to round up my Amazon order from $19 to $25... In other words, I could spend six bucks on shipping or get six bucks in cookies and free shipping. You do the math.  What totally surprised me is how BIG the bag was.  I wasn't really paying attention, but 40 oz is two and a half POUNDS of cookies!

My cat was recently diagnosed with hyperthyroidism and I now have to give her two pills a day.  After struggling with hiding it in her food or in cream cheese (she fought me all the way even with these methods), I did an internet search and found out about pill pockets.  So far, so good.  She eats the treat and swallows the pill with no problems.  I'm really happy with this product.

Summary: Not quite as good as remembered.
